dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Temperatures in Astana are looking pretty mild, like a thermostat that just can't make up its mind.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Temperatures in Astana are looking pretty mild, like a thermostat that just can't make up its mind.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it says here, um, they're expecting some light rain and even thunderstorms on May 28th, which is, you know, not too surprising for spring.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it says here, um, they're expecting some light rain and even thunderstorms on May twenty eighth, which is, you know, not too surprising for spring.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: May 28: Partly cloudy with a chance of light rain and thunderstorms in the afternoon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and the winds are gonna be shifting around too, from northwest to northeast at like 9 to 18 meters per second. That's… brisk.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and the winds are gonna be shifting around too, from northwest to northeast at like nine to eighteen meters per second. That's... brisk.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Winds will shift from northwest to northeast at 9"18 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But then it clears up for the 29th, no rain at all. And the temps stay really consistent, nighttime around +8 to +10, daytime up to +24. Pretty steady.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then it clears up for the twenty ninth, no rain at all. And the temps stay really consistent, nighttime around +eight to +ten, daytime up to +twenty four. Pretty steady.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: May 29: Partly cloudy skies without precipitation. Nighttime temperatures will be around +8...+10ÂC, with daytime highs of +22...+24ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Almaty's got a different story though. They're dry for the first couple days, but then on the 30th—boom, rain and thunderstorms in the afternoon. Better keep an umbrella handy, like it says.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Almaty's got a different story though. They're dry for the first couple days, but then on the thirtieth-boom, rain and thunderstorms in the afternoon. Better keep an umbrella handy, like it says.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: May 30: Rain and thunderstorms are expected in the afternoon. Be sure to keep an umbrella handy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh for sure. And you know, earlier the Minister of Ecology, uh, Yerlan Nysanbayev, he shared the summer outlook too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh for sure. And you know, earlier the Minister of Ecology, uh, Yerlan Nysanbayev, he shared the summer outlook too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Minister of Ecology and Natural Resources Yerlan Nysanbayev shared the weather forecast for the upcoming summer in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! He mentioned that in June, some parts of the southwest could hit up to 45°C. That is scorching.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! He mentioned that in June, some parts of the southwest could hit up to forty five degrees c. That is scorching.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In some parts of the southwest, temperatures could reach 45ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely brutal. But rainfall in June and July should be normal overall, though the north and south might get a bit more.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely brutal. But rainfall in June and July should be normal overall, though the north and south might get a bit more.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rainfall in June and July is expected to be within normal levels, though the north, south, and southeast may receive slightly more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And then by August and September, it's supposed to be drier and a degree warmer than usual. Classic late summer vibe.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then by August and September, it's supposed to be drier and a degree warmer than usual. Classic late summer vibe.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In August and September, less rainfall is expected, and temperatures may be about 1ÂC above normal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Still, you know, it's all preliminary. Weather's so hard to pin down more than a few days out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, you know, it's all preliminary. Weather's so hard to pin down more than a few days out.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This forecast is preliminary and subject to change.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. But for now, if you're in Astana this week, pack layers. And maybe a raincoat just in case.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. But for now, if you're in Astana this week, pack layers. And maybe a raincoat just in case.
